what: I am a developer pasionated in web development. Currently in my last year of studying media science. Thank you for visiting my portfolio.

aboutDesc:
I am currently studying media informatics at Rhein Main university in Wiesbaden. 
 During my studies i felt in love with web development and now i follow my own projects in my free time. I balance this out with doing lots of sports and traveling.
